diff_hunk:
@@ -674,6 +674,10 @@ def topk(g, self, k, dim=None, largest=True, sorted=True, out=None):
     return g.op("TopK", self, k_i=k, axis_i=dim, outputs=2)
 
 
+def repeat(g, self, repeats):
+    return g.op("Tile", self, g.op("Constant", value_t=torch.LongTensor(repeats)))
body:
We should check `len(repeats) == len(self.type().sizes())`.
If not:
- `len(repeats) < len(self.type().sizes())`, then add `1`s to the second operand.
- `len(repeats) > len(self.type().sizes())`, probably call `Reshape` + `Tile`
body_html:
We should check len(repeats) == len(self.type().sizes()).
If not:

  • len(repeats) < len(self.type().sizes()), then add 1s to the second operand.
  • len(repeats) > len(self.type().sizes()), probably call Reshape + Tile
body_text:
We should check len(repeats) == len(self.type().sizes()).
If not:

len(repeats) < len(self.type().sizes()), then add 1s to the second operand.
len(repeats) > len(self.type().sizes()), probably call Reshape + Tile
